thread.title: Academy Sports: Men’s Nike Shoes ONLY $24.99 Shipped
thread.title_full: Academy Sports: Men’s Nike Shoes ONLY $24.99 Shipped

author: Hannah
title: Academy Sports: Men’s Nike Shoes ONLY $24.99 Shipped
text:
While supplies last, head on over to Academy.com where they have dropped the price on select styles of these Men’s Nike Downshifter 6 Running Shoes to only $24.99 (regularly $39.99)! Even sweeter, shipping is FREE on all shoes, OR you can choose free in-store pickup, if available near you. 
Seems like a great deal since these same shoes are priced between $46-$197 on Amazon , with great reviews!
(Thanks, Denise!)
